title: @Riot KateyKhaos Project: Ashe hoodie
body: Hello, I was wondering if there was a specific reason as to why Project: Ashe hoodie is toggled automatically instead of giving the player the option ? ^_^

replies.body: YES PLEASE! I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE IT AS PLAYER OPTION!
agreed. while it is cool they implement a new mechanic to it, i wish it was more of a choice thing.

It's not really a new mechanic, Nighthunter Rengar has a toggle option available -- by choice option that's been long implemented by Riot. And it's only a 975 skin, which is why I don't understand, instead of making it a turret thing why not just make it option. If you're pushing majority of the game then the hood will always be on, until you back and only for those moment you're back the hood is off. Or if you're being pressured and have to stay near turrets, the hood will never go on. I really much prefer it to be a choice thing, because the automatic system will make it lack a lot subtlety. For instant, say I am being pressured really hard in lane, and all of a sudden I toggle my hat on and "Fuck shit up" that's pretty dope...
By new tech I ment auto changing on location
Ah yes you're right. I tweeted KateyKhaos about it on twitter, and her response was "it's a new way to use toggle tech, and keeping the skin unique" -- which i find very disappointing meh.

Hello! 

In this case, we felt it was a cool/unique way to use the toggle tech! So, as opposed to toggling whenever, we felt it would be more interesting to have her hood toggle up when shes in enemy territory - she's getting ready for battle!
Does it also toggle on when she's under attack? Because when I get dove under my tower, I think I'm in a hostile area.
If you're in friendly territory, the hood shouldn't pop up, even if you're under your town tower getting dove. The hood isn't tied to combat.
Shame. :( What about the ruins of friendly towers? Do those count as extending friendly territory?
You turret, even when it's destroyed, will still be friendly territory. :)

Dang, guess I'll have to win hard to see Ashe with the hood on; I imagine being on the losing team means Ashe won't use her cool hood as much when you're desperately defending your turrets.

Thanks for answering the questions! I know you guys're confident in the current direction, just wanna drop the line that I think hooded Project: Ashe looks cooler than without the hood, so I'd prefer to have that more.

Makes sense thematically, but you know we players would like a toggle option on all legendary skins. 

This includes toggle-able shirts, hoods, shoes, pets, mounts, and summoners. Thanks I love to toggle!
Toggles are so janky, which is why we're careful when we use them. D: I do agree that it's a cool idea, and if there is a great opportunity for it, we should try for it!

Are you saying this is not a great opportunity, because this is as good as it will ever get...
Because she has an idle mode and a combat mode? The thematic of the skin would be lost if she did not use the combat mode to fight.
So in idle mode am i suppose to go afk ;D? Hopefully I don't get reported then.
i wish it was like the rengar skin's hood
Im wondering how can you put and take off Rengar's hood? Is there a specific key on your keyboard for it?
I think it's the taunt. Not sure though
I wanna toggle option
I wanted Pool Party Taric to have a coat toggle, but they declined.

At least you can still spam recall and rip the jacket off of his glorious bod over and over again.
